title: aNNal rAmacandranuDan (Unjal pATTu)
sahitya:
anupallavi



aNnal rAmacandranuDan AraNangu sItai vaNNamuDan UnjalADum vaibhavattaik-kANIr kANIr
viNNavarum maNNavarum kaN kuLirak-kANa vEdam nAngum gItam pADA nAthanuDan sItai (ADirUnjal)
navaratna maNi paditta svarNamaya Unjal candra sUrya kulamaNigaL antamuDan amarndu (ADirUnjal)
vaidEhiyuDan rAman vaDivazhagaik-kaNDu ratiyuDan anangan manam veTkit-talai kuniya (ADirUNjal)
dundubi muzhanga engum dEvar kuzhAnkUDi antarantaninru sugandha malar tUva (ADirUnjal)
